bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names pi feng 皮風 , fu feng 膚風， pi jian feng 皮間風. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of pi zhen 皮疹 , skin papules; chuan zhong 瘡腫 , sores and swelling; tuo xie 脫屑 , desquamation, and sao yang 瘙癢 , itching. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 19 Recipe Entry cang er jiu 蒼耳酒 , wine with cang er : 大去皮膚風 , “[Capable of] massively eliminating skin wind ”.
